Skill Notes:
Deity And Cause: Arcana
Intelligence Language Bonus: +1 Language Count
Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 8 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 2 from any)
Skill Training (Abadar Lore): Skill Trained (Abadar Lore)
Skilled Human: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Thief: Skill Trained (Thievery)
Assurance (Accounting Lore): Can take an automatic 17 on Accounting Lore checks
Automatic Knowledge (Accounting Lore): Can use Assurance (Accounting Lore) to Recall Knowledge as a free action once per rd
Break Curse: After 8 hr of preparation, can use Occultism or Religion for a 2-level counteract check against a curse
Dubious Knowledge: Failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Magical Shorthand: Can learn new spells with 10 min of study and retry 1 week after a failure/Can learn new spells at a discounted cost
Oddity Identification: +2 Occultism to Identify Magic with a fortune, mental, possession, prediction, or scrying trait
Quick Identification: Can Identify Magic in 1 min
Quick Recognition: Can use a skill with master proficiency to Recognize A Spell as a free action once per rd
Recognize Spell: (R) Successful roll of the connected skill gives recognition of a spell; critical success also gives +1 against effects, and critical failure misidentifies it; trained, expert, master, or legendary proficiency guarantees success on spells up to level 2, 4, 6, or 10
Seasoned: +1 to Craft food and drink
Trick Magic Item: (1) Successful check on the related skill activates a magic item until the end of the turn
Combat
Hit Points: 32 Armor Class: 20 (dexterity (3 max); trained) Class DC: Rogue: 19 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Dart (+9 1d4+2 P R20'; dexterity; trained); Greatclub (+7 1d10+2 B; strength; trained); Longsword (+7 1d8+2 S/P; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Thief: +2 damage with finesse melee weapons
Unconventional Weaponry (Heavy Crossbow): Weapon Familiarity (Heavy Crossbow)
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of equal or lower level
Mobility: Can Stride at half Speed without triggering reactions
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or projectile weapon vs. a flat-footed foe inflicts +1d6 HP precision damage
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts off-guard vs. self on creatures that haven't acted
Tumble Behind: Successful Tumble Through inflicts off-guard against next self attack before the end of the turn
Save: Fortitude: +5 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +11 (dexterity; expert); Will: +8 (wisdom; expert)
Notes
Validation Errors:
Break Curse Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and occultism rank (currently 2) >= 3 or religion rank >= 3
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 4 available vs. 11 allocated
Quick Recognition Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7, arcana rank (currently 1) >= 3, nature rank >= 3, occultism rank (currently 2) >= 3 or religion rank >= 3 and recognize spell feature (currently 1)
